officialDesc: John R. Lewis College is the newest college at UC Santa Cruz. Consistent with UCSC's founding vision, John R. Lewis College creates an integrated living-and-learning environment through engaging academic and extracurricular programs focusing on the theme of Social Justice and Community.
studentDesc: John R. Lewis College, or more commonly referred to by C10 (before JRL bought the name), is the neighbor of College 9 (C9).
